1.title: Episode #2.1

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Jon and Nkechi talk with Olympic Gold Medalist Cullen Jones about his work with Make A Splash.

2.title: Episode #2.2

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Jon and Nkechi talk about implication of policies such as Don't Ask Don't Tell. Also features part II of the interview with Cullen Jones.

3.title: Episode #2.3

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Jon and Nkechi talk adoption and foster care. Also features interview with Trent Stamp, Executive Director of the Eisner Foundation.

4.title: Episode #2.4

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Jon and Nkechi discuss school reform.

5.title: Episode #2.5

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Jon and Nkechi introduce you to the four gentlemen of the Young Black Men Photovoice Project, a group of African-American men fighting to improve the conditions for at-risk, inner-city, youth.

6.title: Episode #2.6

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Part II of Jon and Nkechi's interview with the gentlemen from the Young Black Men's Photovoice Project.

7.title: Episode #2.7

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Jon and Nkechi discuss student activism and interview Dr. Ernest Morrell from UCLA's I.D.E.A.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Jon and Nkechi discuss relationships and marriage and what it takes to make it work after so many years. A dangerous topic for co-hosts who also happen to be married.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Jon and Nkechi interview Diane Keaton about being involved in socially conscious issues. This episode is part 1 of the interview.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Features Part II of the Diane Keaton interview on socially conscious issues. Jon and Nkechi talk about parenting and schooling.

episode of.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (TV Series 2010– )

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: Talk show hosted by real-life married couple Jon Carroll and Nkechi Okoro. This show is about subjects that matter - plain and simple! It features interviews with public figures about socially conscious issues for which they are passionate. The show specifically gives guests a spotlight to talk about causes they are working on that are important to them and the community as a whole. In addition to the interview segment, the show also features topics of the week and the recurring segments - I'm Just Talkin' and Urban Chameleon Fun Facts - which feature special correspondents Torrance Jordan and Haj sharing their unique perspectives on society and culture.
imdb.title: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi
akas: A Breath of Fresh Air with Jon and Nkechi (United States)
plot: Talk show about socially conscious issues and public figures using their powers to truly make a difference in the community.::Rock My Soul Productions

Talk show hosted by real-life married couple Jon Carroll and Nkechi Okoro. This show is about subjects that matter - plain and simple! It features interviews with public figures about socially conscious issues for which they are passionate. The show specifically gives guests a spotlight to talk about causes they are working on that are important to them and the community as a whole. In addition to the interview segment, the show also features topics of the week and the recurring segments - I'm Just Talkin' and Urban Chameleon Fun Facts - which feature special correspondents Torrance Jordan and Haj sharing their unique perspectives on society and culture.::Nkechi Okoro
